snippet: “The Painted Bird,” an ambitious trilogy of dance theater works by Pavel Zustiak that are usually seen only in separate installments, was performed in one long evening at La MaMa E.T.C.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance of all three parts of Pavel Zustiak dance The Painted Bird at La MaMa’s Ellen Stewart Theater as part of La MaMa Moves! festival.
lead_paragraph: “The Painted Bird,” an ambitious trilogy of dance theater works by Pavel Zustiak that are usually seen only in separate installments, was performed in one long evening at La MaMa E.T.C.

headline.seo: Pavel Zustiak’s ‘Painted Bird’ Blurs Insiders and Outsiders
headline.main: On a Harrowing Journey, No Matter Who You Are
headline.print_headline: On a Harrowing Journey, No Matter Who You Are
